game.title: The Quest for Progress and Experience
game.objective: Complete quests to progress through the game, defeat enemies for experience points, and level up to earn rewards.
game.reward: Weapons, armor, gems, or consumables as rewards for completing quests
game.quest-giver: The Questmaster in the town square

task.objective: Speak to the Questmaster and accept a quest.
task.description: You'll receive a detailed description of your objective, as well as any important information about the quest or the enemies you may face.

task.objective: Defeat X enemies in the designated area.
task.description: Once you've accepted a quest, you may be required to defeat a certain number of enemies in a specific area. This will help you gain experience points towards leveling up.

task.objective: Speak to the quest giver again to collect your reward.
task.description: Once you've completed a quest, return to the quest giver to collect your reward. If your reward is particularly valuable, you may be able to exchange it with certain NPCs for even better rewards.
